com.guardtime.envelope.signature

Interface EnvelopeSignature<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Class of the underlying signature.

    NB! compareTo should indicate which EnvelopeSignature was created first.

    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<EnvelopeSignature<O>>

    public interface EnvelopeSignature<O>
extends Comparable<EnvelopeSignature<O>>
    General interface for all possible signature implementations.
